io.sdchain.net

类 APIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sdchain.model.SDChainObject
      • io.sdchain.net.ServerClass
        • io.sdchain.net.APIServer

  • public class APIServer
extends ServerClass
    Extends the server class when you need request anything from sdchain the class only pass the parameters and data to the server and return the data to the , not handling the response anymore.

      Http request method: Get, Post and Delete

      • formatURL

        public static java.lang.String formatURL(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                         java.lang.String address,
                                         java.lang.String param)

        formed URL
        抛出:
        InvalidRequestException

      • shouldAppendSignature

        public static java.lang.Boolean shouldAppendSignature(APIServer.RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                                      java.lang.String apiVersion)
        Should append signature string.
        参数:
        requestMethod - the request method
        apiVersion - the api version
        返回:
        the string

      • request

        public static <T> T request(APIServer.RequestMethod method,
                            java.lang.String url,
                            java.lang.String params,
                            java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                     throws AuthenticationException,
                            InvalidRequestException,
                            APIConnectionException,
                            ChannelException,
                            APIException,
                            FailedException
        Build class instance from jason format http response
        类型参数:
        T -
        参数:
        method - the method of request
        url - the request of url
        params - the request of param
        clazz -
        返回:
        class instance
        抛出:
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        APIConnectionException
        APIException
        FailedException
        ChannelException
